buyer.official_name: Department of the Environment Climate and Communications

procedure.title: The provision of Feasibility study, project implementation plan and project support services, for an Interconnected System of Cyber Security Coordination and Response Networks (CORE)
procedure.description: The National Cyber Security Centre (NCSC), a part of the Department of the Environment, Climate and Communications (DECC) wishes to invite tenders to assist it in the development of a comprehensive feasibility study and project implementation plan for an Interconnected System of Cyber Security Coordination and Response Networks (CORE) as well as ongoing project support services.
